Control Name: REL 6.7 Monitor end-to-end tracing of requests through your system
Control Statement: Use AWS X-Ray or third-party tools so that developers can more easily analyze and debug distributed systems to understand how their applications and its underlying services are performing

control_attributes.Control: REL 6.7 Monitor end-to-end tracing of requests through your system
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you monitor workload resources?
